data.quote: Technology is a useful servant but a dangerous master.
data.author: Christian Lous Lange

data.quote: The science of today is the technology of tomorrow
data.author: Edward Teller

data.quote: I am so fresh in soul and spirit that life gushes and bubbles around me in a thousand springs.
data.author: Robert Schumann

data.quote: Enjoy failure and learn from it. You can never learn from success.
data.author: James Dyson

data.quote: I believe there are three keys to success. For me it is keeping my priorities in order: It's my faith and my family, and then the business.
data.author: Kathy Ireland

data.quote: In motivating people, you've got to engage their minds and their hearts. I motivate people, I hope, by example - and perhaps by excitement, by having productive ideas to make others feel involved.
data.author: Rupert Murdoch

data.quote: The only constant in the technology industry is change
data.author: Marc Benioff

data.quote: I think a simple rule of business is, if you do the things that are easier first, then you can actually make a lot of progress.
data.author: Mark Zuckerberg

data.quote: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing.
data.author: Warren Buffet

data.quote: Progress is often equal to the difference between mind and mindset.
data.author: Narayana Murthy

data.quote: Sometimes you can't see yourself clearly until you see yourself through the eyes of others.
data.author: Ellen DeGeneres

data.quote: TYou must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: Success isn't about how much money you make. It's about the difference you make in people's lives.
data.author: Michelle Obama
